body:
Everyday on this server, I see people raging in chat "HAX0R U N00B GET A LIFE BAN BAN BAN BAN BAN STAFFFFF MEMEBBER COM TOO ME ME ME ME" and when a staff member takes their time to come and check on what you're reporting about, usually no one's hacking, but even if they are, the staff punishes them and still not a single thank you from the player.

Or here on the forums, more recently with Storm and Robo's demotion.

I was sad too, as Storm was a good friend of mine and even though I didn't talk to Robo much he was a good person and a great staff member.

Now, most of us have reacted in "Why was he demoted? Tell us!!!". That is personal information that only will be shared if the demoted staff allow it to.

They were demoted for a reason. Avicus has amazing staff and wouldn't demote out of randomness.

So, anyway, I'd like to say, for all of Avicus and it's players,

Thank you, Avicus Staff, for your hard work to keep this server healthy.

-Zach

replies.body:
You can go to the Teams section of the forums (Under "Community" in the left Navigation bar) where you can make a forum post, which will then create your team essentially.

On Topic: The staff team is incredible on this server, better than any other server I've been on to. They really deserve all the praise <3
